wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core.histogram

Interface HistogramThresholding

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Histogram
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HistogramIJ

    public interface HistogramThresholding
extends Histogram
    This interface exposes the functionality of computing a gray level threshold for binarization, implementing some of the methods refered to in the ThresholdingOption enumeration.
    Author:
    remy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBinarizationThreshold(ThresholdingOption method)
      Computes the grey level threshold value for binarizing an image using this instance's histogram.

      • Methods inherited from interface wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core.histogram.Histogram

        duplicate, getGrayLevelAverage, getGrayLevelStandardDeviation, getLength, getValue, incrementValue, readFromFile, setValue, writeToFile

    • Method Detail

      • getBinarizationThreshold

        int getBinarizationThreshold(ThresholdingOption method)
                      throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Computes the grey level threshold value for binarizing an image using this instance's histogram. Different method can be used to compute the threshold.
        Specified by:
        getBinarizationThreshold in interface Histogram
        Parameters:
        method - the thresholding method
        Returns:
        the threshold for the image
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the thresholding option is not implemented
